scripts.download-images: node src/download_images.js 1 && node src/download_images.js 2 && node src/download_images.js 3 && node src/download_images.js 4
scripts.generate: node src/generate_season.js 1 && node src/generate_season.js 2 && node src/generate_season.js 3 && node src/generate_season.js 4 && node src/generate_index.js
scripts.build: npm run download-images && npm run generate
